name: Insurance by the State, counties, and municipalities
text: §386-128  Insurance by the State, counties, and municipalities.  The State, any county or other political subdivision of the State, and any other public entity within the State which is liable to its employees for compensation, may insure with any authorized insurance carrier. [L 1963, c 116, pt of §1; Supp, §97-127; HRS §386-128]
